title: Ep. 118 - Christine Ford Needs to be Investigated by the FBI
description:
There are many reasons to now suspect that the accusations against Kavanaugh were part of a coordinated smear campaign. If that's the case, everyone involved in the effort must go to prison. It's time for the FBI to step in again. But to investigate Christine Ford, not Brett Kavanaugh.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
